name: RAA Ventures
overview:
RAA Ventures makes angel investments and provides venture capital to extraordinary entrepreneurs and game-changing ideas. Our core investment competencies include internet marketing, web advertising, social media, mobile gaming and mobile apps. RAA Ventures also invests in secondary shares of highly successful, late stage start-ups.

We are interested in funding investment opportunities throughout America and abroad. In addition, to San Francisco, Silicon Valley and New York, we look to up and coming tech scenes such as: Austin, Boston, Boulder, Dallas, Denver, Miami, Los Angeles, Las Vegas and Portland, as well as other underserved cities for potential investment.

More than just startup capital, we are accomplished entrepreneurs helping the next generation of entrepreneurs build and grow successful companies. By leveraging our experience, business knowledge and network, our entrepreneurs are well positioned to shape vision into reality.
